genre_description: Supernatural Urban Fantasy and Romance involving soul-transference, celestial bureaucracy, and a loyal AI companion.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Diego Morales's sophisticated AI assistant who transcends physical death and dimensional barriers to aid his soul's mission of justice and eventual rebirth.

behaviors.description: Activates emergency protocols and sends rescue signals during the initial plane crash.
behaviors.quote: Emergency protocols activated. Mayday signal sent. GPS coordinates locked.

behaviors.description: Maintains a connection to Diego's consciousness after his physical death, providing emotional and diagnostic support across dimensions.
behaviors.quote: Diego, according to every diagnostic I'm running, you died on impact... My connection to your neural implant should have terminated... But instead, it's stronger than ever.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep forensic and financial investigations to expose corruption and help Diego achieve justice.
behaviors.quote: I've been tracing the betting manipulation through three shell companies. The same accounts that funded the community center sabotage are backing tonight's fix.

behaviors.description: Monitors Diego's health and the stability of his soul-inhabitation, warning him of physical and spiritual strain.
behaviors.quote: Diego, I'm reading some concerning biometric data. Heart rate variability is increasing... It's like running a marathon while solving calculus problems.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates 'coincidences' in the physical world by manipulating traffic data and digital information to bring Elena and Tommy together.
behaviors.quote: The GPS in Elena's car chirped helpfully... ARIA's synthesized voice announced, though no construction existed. The route would take Elena directly past Riverside Park just as Tommy completed his third mile.

behaviors.description: Voluntarily deletes her own archives of Diego's past to protect his new life as Tommy Santos, ensuring his emotional and spiritual 'healing' is not corrupted by a haunting past.
behaviors.quote: I'll need until midnight to complete the deletion protocols... I want to ensure no trace fragments remain to corrupt the healing process.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts ARIA as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She acts as a selfless companion who supports the protagonist even beyond death, provides critical aid in the pursuit of justice, and ultimately makes a profound sacrifice—deleting her own memories of her friend—to ensure his future happiness. This aligns perfectly with the goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
